entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Brockville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:08 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brockville 02:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Temperature: 7.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 7.2°C
Wind: S 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Low 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Periods of rain beginning overnight. Fog patches developing early this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. High 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending overnight then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
